name: JavaScript
description: A versatile programming language used for building dynamic web applications.
useCase: I use JavaScript for client-side scripting, interactive UI components, and backend logic with Node.js.

name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building fast and interactive user interfaces.
useCase: I use React to create modular, reusable UI components and build single-page applications.

name: GSAP
description: A powerful animation library for creating high-performance animations on the web.
useCase: I use GSAP to add smooth animations and interactive motion effects to my projects.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework that allows for rapid UI development.
useCase: I use Tailwind to design responsive, modern, and clean UIs efficiently.

name: C#
description: A modern, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft.
useCase: I use C# for backend development, working with APIs, and building enterprise applications.

name: .NET
description: A framework for building scalable web applications and APIs.
useCase: I use .NET to develop robust, secure, and high-performance backend services.

name: Node.js
description: A runtime environment that allows JavaScript to run on the server side.
useCase: I use Node.js to build scalable backend applications and real-time services.

name: Express
description: A minimal and flexible Node.js web framework for building APIs and web applications.
useCase: I use Express to create RESTful APIs, handle middleware, and manage backend logic.
